about_the_game:
Love Season - Sharing Fantasy allows you to share the love with other male characters - basically, you'll get to see the female main cast having sex with other characters besides the main character! All interactions must have the approval of the player to happen and no one will fall in love with someone else, or cheat on the main character.

This DLC adds three new sex scenes at different points in Season 1 and Season 2 (Mia and Elder, Mia and Darius, Nina and Trevor), plus a small new interaction between Nova and Darius. All scenes are automatically unlocked in the Gallery menu (Replay and pictures).

We're hoping to expand the story even more in this direction if enough people are interested! 💕💖

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!

This game depicts explicit sexual acts and situations that some players may find offensive or triggering. All characters shown in the game are over 18 years old and all sexual acts are consensual.

name: Love Season - Sharing Fantasy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 125 MB available space

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
